committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To eliminate the 25 percent increase in pay for Members of the House of Representatives provided by the Ethics Reform Act of 1989, and for other purposes.

summary.text: States that the 25 percent pay increase beginning in 1991 under the Ethics Reform Act of 1989 shall not be effective with respect to Members of the House of Representatives. Amends provisions of the Ethics Reform Act of 1989 relating to: (1) elimination of honoraria; and (2) limitations on outside earned income and employment.

titles.title: To eliminate the 25 percent increase in pay for Members of the House of Representatives provided by the Ethics Reform Act of 1989, and for other purposes.
